response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am excited to offer it to you. Considering its significance and the benefits it can bring to you, I propose a purchase price of $1,300,000. This offer is designed to be mutually beneficial, providing you with access to a valuable asset while ensuring a fair return for my investment. I look forward to discussing this further and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both of us. Please let me know your thoughts on this proposal.", "product_price": 1300000}
